placing.translation[0].definitions[0].de: the position of someone or something in a competition or ordered list
placing.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Hancock and Smith took the top two placings.
placing.translation[1].definitions[0].de: the sale by a financial institution of shares, bonds etc for a company, or a particular quantity of shares etc sold in this way
placing.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: The share issue will be through placings in the UK and internationally.
